name: Our Ping Means Death
description:
Your ragtag crew of scallywag pirates have commandeered a fancy new submarine. Pillage away while you can keep things running - the submarine's systems can be damaged by torpedoes. Critical ship functions will be impaired by damaged systems.

Controls :

w/s for fore and aft propulsion

a/d for rudder (steering left and right)

(You must be moving forward or in reverse to steer)

c/space to set dive planes (set pitch) (also needs forward or reverse motion to affect dive planes)

q/e to fill and drain ballast tanks (set buoyancy to alter flotation)

left click to select targets for up to 4 torpedo tubes, right on target to fire targeted tubes

Pick up loot dropped from destroyed surface ships and enemy submarines.
